name: shoppersprint
description: ShopperSprint - A comprehensive full-stack web application for tracking and comparing product prices across multiple online sources

scripts.stop: echo 'Use Ctrl+C to stop development servers'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:cache && rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.db:reset: echo 'Docker removed - use direct database connection instead'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && npm run test:coverage && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npm run type-check && cd ../frontend && npm run type-check
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:rollback: echo 'Vercel rollback not supported in this version'
scripts.deploy:status: echo 'Check Vercel dashboard for deployment status'
scripts.env:switch: echo 'Environment switching not supported in Vercel version'
scripts.env:validate: echo 'Environment validation not supported in Vercel version'
scripts.env:production: echo 'Production environment managed by Vercel dashboard'
scripts.assets:generate: echo 'Asset generation not implemented in Vercel version'
scripts.dns:check: echo 'DNS checking not implemented in Vercel version'
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.quality:full: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run typecheck
scripts.service:status: echo 'Service status not implemented in Vercel version'
scripts.service:logs: echo 'Service logs not implemented in Vercel version'
scripts.build:setup: echo 'Build setup not implemented in Vercel version'
scripts.deploy:logs: echo 'Deploy logs not implemented in Vercel version'

author: ntanwir
